author: Special Correspondent
text:
Power shutdown tomorrow

Power supply will be suspended between 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. on Tuesday in the following areas under Anaiyur substation on account of monthly maintenance: Dinamani Nagar, Karisalkulam, Pandian Nagar, IOC Colony, VMW Colony, Sangeeth Nagar, Chokkalinga Nagar, Koodal Nagar first to thirteenth streets, Chellaiah Nagar, J.J. Nagar, Shanthi Nagar, Railar Nagar, Kovil Pappakudi, Sikkander Chavadi, Fatima College, Meenakshi Nagar, Old and New Vilangudi and Ramamoorthy Nagar, according to a release.
title: TAMIL NADU
